UB_SWITCH_ALERT_TOASTS_SOUND_DESC: Plays a customisable sound on toast (to change, head over to the [Customise](onCustomizeClick) tab).
UB_SWITCH_ALERT_POPUP_SOUND_DESC: Plays a customisable sound on popup (to change, head over to the [Customise](onCustomizeClick) tab).
UB_SETTINGS_PERSONALIZED_MESSAGE_PLACEHO: Treat your friends with the perfect personalised message. If left blank, a simple "Happy birthday!" will be used instead.
UB_SETTINGS_CUSTOMIZE_TAB_SOUND_DESC: Customise the sound that gets played when one of the alerts that you chose appears.
